title: 2.0 Release
body:
If you haven't been beta testing, this is probably your first PSA. Yes, Homework Central has PSAs now!

This major new release of your favorite schedule app brings to you:

  • PSAs (like this one!)
  • Removal of zoom links
  • Compacted task manager
  • Fully customizable course colors
  • Barcode generator
  • Crisis lifelines
  • Gunn calendar events
  • Updated club and staff list, along with a starring system (try it.)
  • 24 hour time mode


If anything seems wonky to you, please shoot me an email at ss44523@pausd.us and I will get back to you as soon as possible. This goes for feature requests, too!

title: Major Upgrades
body:
Homework Central Beta is nearing the end of Betahood! This PSA brings to you:

  • A functioning to-do list
  • A barcode generator! Woooo!
  • Crisis lifelines, copied over from UGWA

title: Congratulations, Seniors! (and some updates)
body:
It's been a long, hard year - but we finally made it to the end!

Here's a few things HC has learned how to do today:

  • display the time remaining until class begins or ends in both the tab title and home view
  • properly manipulate colors so you don't strain your eyes

title: Never be late again!
body: Now, whenever school is ongoing, Homework Central will display the time remaining in the tab title!

title: New Features
body:
Homework Central now has . . .

  • Settings that save
  • 24-hour time
  • Custom names and colors for each class
  • Dark mode!
